name: Dark Roast Taster Pack - (3 packs x 75 gm each) | 20% Off on Checkout
description: Here's a handpicked collection of our finest 100% Arabica coffees for the Dark roast coffee enthusiasts. Every Dark Roast Taster Pack contains 3 packs of 75 gms each of: Mysore Nuggets Extra Bold - A true-blue Indian Specialty coffee, the Mysore Nuggets is the preferred choice for lovers of the South Indian filter and French Press coffee lovers. It can be brewed with other methods as well and delivers a low-acidic and balanced cup of coffee, with notes of Spice, Dark Chocolate, and Nuts. Community Blend - Our proud ode to the community of farmers, traders, and partners who help us get the finest 100% Arabica coffee to you every day. Featuring notes of Smoke, Wood, and Dark Chocolate, the Community Blend delivers a well-rounded strong cup of coffee. Vienna Roast - The darkest of the coffees at Bombay Island, every cup of the Vienna Roast delivers ark Chocolate notes with a smoky aroma. Try this for a strong and bold cup of coffee. Try the Dark-roast Taster range if you are looking for a diverse dark-roast experience.

name: Medium-Dark Roast Taster Pack - (4 packs x 75 gm each) | 20% Off on Checkout
description: For the Medium-Dark roast coffee lovers, here's a handpicked collection of our finest 100% Arabica coffees. Every Medium-Dark Taster Pack contains 4 packs of 75 gms each of: Bynemara Estate - A Specialty-grade Single Estate coffee from the famed Bynemara Estate in Chikmagalur. The Bynemara Estate carries taste notes of Toffee, Chocolate, and Nuts, with a rich texture & aroma to boot. Full City Roast - Often considered the best of both worlds, this medium-dark roast coffee is a medley of fruity & nutty flavour notes with a sweet aftertaste. This coffee delivers a smooth & medium acidic brew, and is perfect for both milk-based and black coffees. Espresso Blend - Perfect for preparing espresso-based drinks such as Latte, Cappuccino, Ristretto, Americano, etc. Featuring flavour notes of Cocoa, Caramel, and Nut, this is perfect for brewing with Espresso machines, Moka Pot, and South Indian Filter, and works equally well with other methods as well. Cold Brew Blend - The Cold Brew blend is a favourite for Cold Brew lovers. Featuring taste notes of Cocoa & Berry, a Cold Brew coffee is perfect for any time of the day. Try this range if you are looking for great medium-dark roast coffees.
tags: estate:grade Single Estate coffee from the famed Bynemara

name: Medium Roast Taster Pack - (2 packs x 75 gm each) | 20% Off on Checkout
description: For the Medium-roast coffee enthusiast in you, here's a handpicked collection of our finest 100% Arabica coffees. Every Medium Roast Taster Pack contains 2 packs of 75 gms each of: Thogarihunkal Estate - A Single Estate roast coffee with taste notes of Citrus, Orange Blossom, and Candy. Every cup of coffee carries a subtle fruitiness and sweetness. Breakfast Blend - The name says it all. This blend's perfect for your morning cup of coffee, with its fruity and caramel taste notes and sweet aroma. It's best enjoyed black with Pour Overs and Aeropress, and suits milk-based coffees too. Try the range if you are looking for great medium roast coffees.

name: Cold Brew - 200 ml (Ready to Drink)
description: Exquisitely curated from our signature cold brew blend of 100% Arabica coffee. Bombay Island's cold brew coffee elevates every moment of your coffee experience. Craft roasted in small batches, this luscious coffee is brewed overnight making an ideal refreshing drink. Let every sip invigorate your mind and kickstart your day.

name: Hot Coffee Server
description: Elevate your coffee experience with the Hario Glass Coffee Server. Its sleek design seamlessly complements your brewing ritual and table setting. Your Coffee, Your Way Crafted for versatility, this server pairs perfectly with pour-over brewers and ensures a smooth transition from brew to serve. Durable Design, Elegant Finish Made with heat-resistant glass, it’s both microwave-safe and easy to clean. Whether solo sips or shared moments, it’s coffee made effortless.
